title: Whitepaper: A Better Way to Sell on Amazon

summary: 5 ways to sell more and save money with Amazon Sales Channel
article: Almost half of all online retail purchases in the US are made on Amazon.

Measured by number of shoppers, Amazon Fashion is the most-shopped apparel retailer in the US, surpassing Walmart. Moreover, Amazon Business is a growing force with millions of business customers around the world, including 55 of the Fortune 100 companies.

Most merchants know that selling on Amazon is a great way to grow their business and profits. But making it work can be a huge operational challenge, and these operating issues can cut into your margins - so how can you make it work?
